cause.description:
As a memorial to Freida Crowley, nee Shelton, the late wife of L.M. "Morris" Crowley, uncle of Zilpha Underwood, please donate to M'Shoogy's Animal Rescue, 11519 Rt. C, Savannah, MO 64485. More information here: http://www.mshoogys.org/donation.htm
1. Animal rescue is valuable humane work.
2. This is a no-kill facility
cause.name: M'Shoogy's Animal Rescue
